event.title: became an independent town under the name of "Cuenca" in 1876

data.event: Once a part of San Jose, it became an independent town under the name of "Cuenca" in 1876.

event.title: celebrates his feast day during May

data.event: The Patron of Cuenca is Saint Isidore the Laborer, the patron of farmers celebrates his feast day during May.
15 Cuenca was founded in 1875 by the decree of the Superior Gobierno issued on August 11, 1875.
15 Cuenca was founded in 1875 by the decree of the Superior Gobierno issued on August 11, 1875.

event.title: 1896, Cuenca had a population of 5,660, which increased

data.event: In 1896, Cuenca had a population of 5,660, which increased to 6,938 in 1898.
Cuenca Institute was founded in 1947 in order to give secondary education and it is the oldest secondary institution in Cuenca.
